metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1774 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The HWP filter in LibreOffice before 4.3.7 and 4.4.x before 4.4.2 and Apache OpenOffice before 4.1.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted HWP document, which triggers an out-of-bounds write.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libreoffice-mysql-connector - 1:4.2.8-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

libreoffice-wiki-publisher - 1:4.2.8-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

browser-plugin-libreoffice - 1:4.2.8-0ubuntu2
